item.title: ARC-Hunyuan-Video: Structured Video Comprehension of Real-World Shorts
item.description:

We introduce ARC-Hunyuan-Video-7B, a powerful multimodal model designed for understanding real-world short videos. Understanding user-generated videos is actually challenging due to their complex visual elements, high information density in both visuals and audio, and fast pacing that focuses on emotional expression and viewpoint delivery. To address this challenge, ARC-Hunyuan-Video-7B processes visual, audio, and textual signals end-to-end for a deep, structured understanding of video through integrating and reasoning over multimodal cues.
